'''The Garden Awakens''' is a [[skin pack]] promoting [[The Garden Awakens]], released during the [[Beyond the Pale Garden]] event. The skin pack consists of two skins.

== Skins ==
{| class="wikitable sortable" width="70%"
|+
! width=100px |Name
! width=60px |Render
!Description
!Notes
|-
|Pale Lumberjack
|[[File:Pale Lumberjack.png|width=131x131]]
|A lumberjack wearing cold green flannel, with warm skin, grayish black hair, and wide brown eyes looking upward to the left. Its clothes, a flannel jacket and suspenders, are incredibly tattered, with [[Resin Clump|resin]]-[[Smithing|trimmed]] gloves and boots.
|A simplified version of [[Pale Wood Punching Lumberjack]], made to fit the limitations of [[Skin|skins]].
|-
|Creaking Skin
|[[File:Creaking Skin.png|width=131x131]]
|A dark-skinned human wearing a creaking mask, with brownish white hair, a shirt covered in [[Pale oak|pale]] bark made to look like the [[Achievement|Heart Transplanter]], and greenish white trousers.
|Underneath the mask, there are no facial features at all.
|}

== Quotes ==
{{quote|'''Brave the pale garden for rewards!'''<br>Take on two spine-chilling collective challenges! Can you place 50 million resin blocks and defeat 75 million creakings? For Bedrock, you’ll earn the Creak emote and Creaking mask. On Java, you’ll get a skin for each completed challenge!|Minecraft.net}}
